inclusion.criterion: cesarean section performed by pfannenstiel skin incision
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: history of drug or alcohol abuse
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: contraindication to post operative nsaid's or narcotics
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has a history of severe 'exploding' headache following a head injury, but was improving with pain medication and ambulating independently.
